original_text: Do not wait for the night to hide what you want to do. That is the time when people disappear from their homes. Do not wait for the night to hide what you want to do.
korean_text: 그대는 밤을 사모하지 말라 인생들이 밤에 그들이 있는 곳에서 끌려 가리라

sentences.original_text: Do not wait for the night
to hide what you want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 하고 싶은 일을 숨기기 위해

sentences.original_text: when people disappear from their homes
Do not wait for the night
to hide what you want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 하고 싶은 일을 숨기기 위해
